articles.content: With the government making it clear that the new windfall tax will also be imposed on special economic zones, Reliance Industries' gross refining margins (GRMs) will be negatively impacted by $6-8 a … [+3717 chars]

articles.author: ANI
articles.title: India's forex reserves rise $2.73 billion after three week of fall - Economic Times
articles.description: ​​According to the RBI's data, India's foreign currency assets, which are the biggest component of the forex reserves, rose $2.334 billion to $529.216 billion during the said week. Further, gold reserves rose $342 million to $40.926 billion, special drawing r…
articles.content:
India's foreign exchange reserves rose by $2.734 billion to $593.323 billion during the week that ended on June 24, the Reserve Bank of India's weekly data showed.
